data.title: Production Coordinator
data.meta_description:
Highly organised, friendly and resourceful Coordinator with foreign filming experience.
I am passionate about empowering my teams to create their best work and I will always go the extra mile to ensure they are successful. I have a proven track record of troubleshooting to resolve complex issues, ha...
data.text:
Highly organised, friendly and resourceful Coordinator with foreign filming experience.

I am passionate about empowering my teams to create their best work and I will always go the extra mile to ensure they are successful. I have a proven track record of troubleshooting to resolve complex issues, having deployed teams both nationwide and internationally. I'm also experienced in managing large budgets, and facilitating crews within a large live events setting.

I've have exposure across a wide range of genres including: Natural History Documentaries, Drama, Entertainment and Live Event

I undertook additional responsibilities as Skills & Development lead, for the BBC’s Youth Talent Network, where I’ve created workshops, training and opportunities for entry to mid level staff members, across the entire corporation. Now looking for my next production opportunity to step up and take on more responsibilities.

Emergency First Aid on Location trained. Confident commercial van driver with full clean licence.

Read Less
